tag_list: fashion, korean-fashion, asian-fashion, k-pop, clothes, bags, shoes, outfit, style
overview:
My background is in Marketing as it was my specialist major at university which I completed alongside a CIM Diploma.

I have worked for one of the biggest IT Recruitment company’s in Europe and was then headhunted to be Division Manager at a smaller company which gave me the flexibility to put my creative stamp on things. I like to diversify into different markets and I teach, lecture and give advice to Individuals on how to make their business strategies more effective.

I have an instinctive ability to think outside the box and tailor base solutions for Individuals and companies.

My main project now is working for Koreanfashionista.com. It is fresh, new and exciting and I like the direction they are going in. We want more people to understand the ethos behind Korean Fashion and Korean Culture.
